title: Non-objective art
brief_description: Defines non-objective (abstract) art and explains how it differs from other types of painting. Points out non-objective things in nature; discusses basic elements (line, shape, color), the uses of non-objective art in industrial design, and the interests of a creative painter. Includes examples of non-objective paintings.
